ISEBE LEZOLIMO: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO

AMAPHULO



IINDABA

USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO




ISebe lezoLimo linenjongo yokukhokela, nokuxhasa ulimo olungatshitshiyo nokukhuthaza uphuhliso lweendawo ezisemaphandleni ngokuthi:
* liqinisekise ukufikeleleka kokutya okwaneleyo, okungenangozi nokunesondlo
* ukuphelisa idolo nokungabikho bulungisa kwiinkqubo zolimo
* liwuphakamise kangangoko umgangatho wendyebo, ingqesho kunye nengeniso yezolimo,
* liphucule iindlela ezingatshitshiyo zolawulo lwezilinywa zendalo kunye neenkqubo zokunxibelelana kwendalo
* liqinisekise ukubakho kweendlela zolawulo ezineziphumo ezizizo nezisebenza kakuhle.
* liqinisekise ukulawulwa ngendlela kolwazi nengcaciso.


Ezinye iinkonzo eli Sebe elibonenela ngazo zezi:
* imfundo noqeqesho, kubandakanywa neebhasari
* ukulawula ukusekwa, ukubhaliswa nokonganye lwa kwemifela-ndawonye.
* ukukhupha uqikelelo lwamanani esivuno
* ukubonelela ngengcaciso echazwe ngokweenkqubo zobalo-manani
* ukulawula intsul
